{T}: Add {U}.

cards.name: Ancestral Council
cards.text: When Ancestral Council enters the battlefield, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: The darkest depths of hardship allow one's true spirit to soar.
cards.name: Angel of Succor
cards.text:
Flying
As long as it's your turn, you and Angel of Succor have hexproof.
Untap all lands you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.name: Anuran Encounters
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland permanents you control.

cards.name: Ardy's Study
cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters the battlefield, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
You may play lands from the archived library.

cards.name: Autumnal Watch
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Avatar of Basat
cards.text:
Menace
Avatar of Basat can't block.

cards.name: Azun, Sheriff of Daisite
cards.text:
[+1]: Tap up to one target creature. Azun, Sheriff of Daisite deals 1 damage to each opponent.
[-1]: Exile another target nonland permanent until Azun, Sheriff of Daisite leaves the battlefield.
[-7]: Detain each permanent target opponent controls.

cards.name: Black Hole Musings
cards.text:
You lose 1 life and exile the top card of your library. You may repeat this process any number of times. Then put up to two cards exiled this way into your hand.
Coalesce {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{B}{B}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield.)
Black Hole Musings's power is equal to the number of cards in exile.

changes: 2024-01-03 — Now a Shaman rather than a Wizard

cards.flavor: “So many have met their end at my hands...”
cards.name: Blood Jade Prophet
cards.text: When Blood Jade Prophet enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. For each card revealed this way, you may pay 3 life. If you do, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

changes: 2022-11-01 — Is now a sorcery.

cards.text: Create an X/X green and blue Plant creature token, where X is the number of differently named lands you control.

changes: 2022-05-01 — Now exiles the target and freecasts the copy instead of just casting it.

cards.text:
Exile target nonland card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
Exile Breach the Lilies.

cards.name: Buy Time
cards.text:
Your life total becomes 0. Until an opponent's next turn, you can't lose the game, your opponents can't win the game, and you can't gain life.
Take an extra turn after this one.
Exile Buy Time.

cards.name: Cane Dancer
cards.text:
Flash

cards.text: Whenever you gain life, Clerics you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.text:
Flash

cards.name: Chart the Vast
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may exile one that doesn't share a mana value with any cards exiled with Chart the Vast. Put the rest on the bottom of your library. If you exiled a card, repeat this process. Otherwise, put all cards exiled this way into your hand.

changes: 2024-05-01 — Changed from instant to sorcery.

cards.text:
Cast this spell only if an opponent controls two or more nonwhite creatures or you control six or more lands.
Create X 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. You gain X life.

cards.text:
Flash
When Commanding Princess enters the battlefield, choose two —
• Commanding Princess deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
• Return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Create a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

rulings.text: If this copies an orchestrate triggered ability, you will cast the card from exile and the original ability will be unable to.

Exile Confirm Hypothesis.

rulings.text: If there is nothing the token can enchant, it will not be created.

cards.text: When Coralight Champion enters the battlefield, create a white Aura enchantment token named Hila's Favor attached to target creature. cards.text:
Cosmic Coalescing deals X damage to any target. You may reveal a noncreature card with mana value X or less you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. X can't be 0.

cards.name: Savage Congregation
cards.text:
Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with total mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.text: Scorch deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Seedshrine
cards.text:
Seedshrine enters the battlefield tapped.
When Seedshrine enters the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

changes: 2022-12-01 — Now has Prophecy {2}{U} (from {1}{U}).
2024-05-01 — No longer has prophecy.
cards.name: Seek Prophecy
cards.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Seeker of Untouched Beauty
cards.text:
As long as you control four or more lands, Seeker of Untouched Beauty gets +2/+2 and has trample.
When Seeker of Untouched Beauty dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Serene Prayer

rulings.text: If you also have glory counters, you choose which replacement effect to apply first.

cards.text:
Vanishing 10 (This permanent enters the battlefield with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
If you would lose 1 or more life other than to pay a cost, instead remove that many time counters from Serene Prayer.

changes: 2023-12-01 — Cast mode now ensures the cast spell has mv 1.
2022-11-01 — Now costs {2}{W/B}{W/B} (from {1}{W/B}{W/B}) Its tutor mode now freecasts the card, and is the second mode rather than the first.

2024-02-01 — Reworked. Was {2}{W/B}{W/B} with modes • Each player who controls the greatest number of creatures sacrifices a creature. • Search your library. You may cast a spell from your library with mana value 1 without paying its mana cost. Then shuffle. • You gain 5 life. • Exile each opponent's graveyard.
cards.name: Shan Jun's Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with mana value 3 or less.
• Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment with mana value 3 or less.
• Exile each opponent's graveyard.
• You gain 3 life.

changes: 2023-03-01 — Mana cost is now {1}{W} (from {W}).
cards.name: Slaffield Workgate
cards.text:
Whenever Slaffield Workgate or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 0/2 white Ox creature token.
{3}{W}: Return another target enchantment you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Slippery Assassin
cards.text:
Flash
When Slippery Assassin enters the battlefield, counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to Slippery Assassin's power.
Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Slippery Assassin.

cards.name: Solar Flare
cards.text: Solar Flare deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Sphinx of Ill Omens
cards.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Ill Omens enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Discard a card: Target creature or player gains hexproof until end of turn.

changes: 2022-08-01 — Copy trigger is now optional.
cards.name: Spirit Script

rulings.text: If Spirit Script becomes a copy of a card and then leaves the graveyard, it will stop being a copy of the card. However, if it left the graveyard due to an ability allowing you to cast it (such as flashback or recite) it will keep that ability.

If an effect moves a Spirit Script that is copying a card from your graveyard and then asks for characteristics of that card (for example: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was an instant, draw a card.) it will use the characteristics of the card Spirit Script was copying.

cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if Spirit Script is in your graveyard, you may have it become a copy of that spell until end of turn.

changes: 2024-06-01 — Changed from 'first time' to perennial trigger.
cards.name: Spiritual Guidance
cards.text:
Once each turn, when you activate a nonmana ability, you may gain 1 life and draw a card.
{2}{W}{U}: You may tap or untap target creature or artifact.

cards.name: Stolen Secrets
cards.text: Choose a nonland card type. Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card of the chosen type from it. That player discards that card.

changes: 2022-05-04 — Orchestrate changed to cast the spell on next spell resolve from next spell cast.
2024-03-01 — Casting from exile is now optional.
cards.name: Stormsurge
cards.text:
Stormsurge deals 3 damage to any target.
Orchestrate {R} (You may exile this card from your hand anytime you could cast a sorcery for its orchestrate cost. When you next resolve a spell, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Suisei the Southern Star
cards.text:
Flying
Suisei the Southern Star gets +1/+1 for each comet counter you have.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of comet counters you have, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Suisei from your graveyard to the battlefield, then you get a comet counter.

cards.name: Summit Guardian
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach
Noncreature spells cost {2} more to cast.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Sunken Ambitions
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

cards.name: Taiyohata Champion

rulings.text: If you cast Taiyohata Champion during your declare attackers step, it will not trigger any "Whenever a creature attacks" abilities.

cards.text:
Flash
First strike
If you cast Taiyohata Champion during your declare attackers step, it enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.

cards.flavor: “...sometimes I wish someone would come for me.”
cards.name: The Girl Who Wouldn't Die
cards.text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
II — Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
III — Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Thriving Budling
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
Augmented — At the beginning of your end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, untap Thriving Budling and put three +1/+1 counters on it.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Has haste again.
cards.name: Thriving Hydra
cards.text:
Trample, haste
Thriving Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
When Thriving Hydra enters the battlefield, for each other creature you control, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature, where X is four minus its power.
Whenever Thriving Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

cards.name: Tidehollow Lich
cards.text:
Embellish {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for {3}{B}, create a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying when it enters the battlefield.)
Tidehollow Lich can't block.
You may cast Tidehollow Lich from your graveyard as long as you control an artifact creature.

changes: 2018-06-01 — Unbanned in MSEM.
2017-10-01 — Activated ability costs {2} more to activate.
2017-10-01 — Banned in MSEM.
cards.flavor: “Mistake” is such a small-minded word. It's not an error, but a step on the path to success.
cards.name: Tinkerer's Tools
cards.text: {X}{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tinkerer's Tools: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value plus X. Put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Tyrant's Breath
cards.text:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each Dragon permanent you control. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Tyrant's Breath deals 7 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Mana cost has increased to {6}{R}{G} (from {5}{R}{G}).
cards.name: Tyrant of Tributes
cards.text:
Flying
When Tyrant of Tributes enters the battlefield, target opponent sacrifices X permanents, where X is half the number of permanents they control, rounded up. You gain X life.

cards.flavor: The swamp bubbled as something horrible promised to rise from the depths.
cards.name: Unearth
cards.text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2}

cards.name: Union Rail Strikebreaker
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

cards.name: Unraveling

rulings.text: If you cast Unraveling from your graveyard, it will not count itself when choosing modes.
If you somehow have more than three Unraveling cards in your graveyard, you will choose all four modes once.

cards.text:
Choose one, then choose another for each card named Unraveling in your graveyard.
• Counter up to one target spell.
• Scry 2, then draw a card.
• Up to three target lands your opponents control don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
• Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.

changes: 2023-11-01 — Cost reduction now checks if you have forty extra cards (from twenty).
cards.name: Unrivaled Fireweaver
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if your starting deck contained at least forty cards more than the minimum deck size.
When Unrivaled Fireweaver enters the battlefield, you may exile a red instant or sorcery card you own from outside the game. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Vaultkeeper
cards.text: Whenever another artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Vidal, Rune Thief
cards.text:
Haste
When Vidal enters the battlefield, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Sacrifice that enchantment at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Vielle, Undercity Wayfarer
cards.text:
Deathtouch, protection from legendary
Vielle, Undercity Wayfarer has all loyalty abilities of permanents on the battlefield that cost +1, +0, or -1.

cards.name: Villainy
cards.text:
Whenever one or more creatures die for the first time each turn, draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Whenever you cast a black noncreature spell, Villainy deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Something is coming from way out beyond the stars.
cards.name: What Lurks Beyond
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library, hand, or graveyard for a creature card with mana value 1 greater than the sacrificed creature's and put it onto the battlefield. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.
